member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.DomainServices.Client.Utility.IsTypeBinary(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns whether the is System.Data.Linq.Binary.

member.returns: Whether the is binary

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.DomainServices.Client.WebDomainClient`1.ComposeAbsoluteServiceUri
member.summary: If the service Uri is relative, this method uses the application source to create an absolute Uri.
member.remarks: If usesHttps in the constructor was true, the Uri will be created using a https scheme instead.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.DomainServices.Client.WebDomainClient`1.ServiceUri
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the domain service.
member.remarks: The value returned is either the absolute Uri passed into the constructor, or an absolute Uri constructed from the relative Uri passed into the constructor. Relative Uris will be made absolute using the Application Host source.
